io.neba.api.resourcemodels

Interface ResourceModelPostProcessor


  • public interface ResourceModelPostProcessor
    Lifecycle callback for resource models.
    processBeforeMapping(Object, Resource, BeanFactory) is invoked after the bean was created and initialized by the BeanFactory but before all resource properties are mapped. All spring lifecycle callbacks where already called at this point.
    processAfterMapping(Object, Resource, BeanFactory) is invoked after the bean was created and initialized by the BeanFactory and all resource properties are mapped. All spring lifecycle callbacks where already called at this point.
    OSGi services providing this interface are automatically detected by the core and apply to all resource models. There are no guarantees concerning the order in which these post processors are invoked; if a specific order is required, implementing a ResourceModelPostProcessor that delegates to other post processors in the desired order is advised.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto
